mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (idx, mid, pwd, name, gender, birthday, tel, address, email, photo, level, userInfor, userDel, point, startDate, lastDate) VALUES (default, #{vo.mid}, #{vo.pwd}, #{vo.name}, #{vo.gender}, #{vo.resident}, #{vo.tel}, #{vo.address}, #{vo.email}, #{vo.photo}, #{vo.level}, default, default, default, default, default);
